CruiserTankThornfall.name: Gallagher Thornfall Mk. VI
CruiserTankThornfall.description: Armed with a rack of Bonesaw mortar launchers, the Thornfall is designed to launch an indirect mechanized assault on enemy armour. This unique vehicle supports an allied assault and cannot withstand large amounts of punishment.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables
Engine can be boosted for increased top speed

AssaultTankLordscar.name: Silverhand Lordscar - Mk. X
AssaultTankLordscar.description: A cut down variation of the Silverhand Assault Tank that sacrifices armour and protection in favour of a high-powered 94.5mm cannon. This open-top weapon platfrom is uniquely designed to intercept enemy armour before they're given time to retaliate. Its moniker is a tribute to the maiming of the great king the Silverhand is named for; while his title was stripped, and his pride damaged, his rage was never quelled.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables
Gunner: Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 31% less damage per shot
High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles
Higher base chance to disable vehicle

FieldCannonSuper.name: Balfour Stockade 75mm
FieldCannonSuper.description: This robust field cannon not only allows infantry to fire heavy 75mm shells with ease, but it provides state-of-the-art curved blast shielding for maximum protection from crossfire.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Can be towed by certain vehicles
Cannoneer: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 35% extra damage per shot
High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

AssaultTankTalos.name: 85V-g "Talos"
AssaultTankTalos.description: The "Talos" is a Velian modification to the 85-series, fitted with an oversized 75mm cannon. Knowing that such a heavy cannon would likely not be suitable, the engineers built it to disperse weight in such a manner that the 85-series chassis could bear it.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to large sized shippables
Turret: High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

FieldAntiTankSuper.name: 945g "Stygian Bolt"
FieldAntiTankSuper.description: The "Stygian Bolt" Large Field Gun is fitted with a monstrous 94.5mm cannon paired with heavy angled blast shielding. Inspired by the rows of narrow canyons in their homeland of the Lacrista province, Mesean engineers designed this field weapons to keep its crew as safe from ancillary fire as possible while maintaining forward momentum.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Can be towed by certain vehicles
Cannoneer: Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 50% extra damage per shot
High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles
Higheer base chance to disable vehicle subsystems
